snippet: The trial of Solo, a goalkeeper for the United States’ national women’s team who is charged with two counts of fourth-degree domestic violence assault, is set to begin Jan. 20.
lead_paragraph: The trial of Solo, a goalkeeper for the United States’ national women’s team who is charged with two counts of fourth-degree domestic violence assault, is set to begin Jan. 20.

headline.main: Hope Solo’s Court Date Is Set in Domestic Violence Case
